name: authgql
description: throwaway repo for graphql and authentication review

scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd server && npm run clean" "cd client && npm run clean"
scripts.cleanall: concurrently "cd server && npm run cleanall" "cd client && npm run cleanall"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm ci && cd ../client && npm ci
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint:fix" "cd client && npm run lint:fix"
